Package org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalypsoPo
    The CalypsoPo class gathers all the information about the current PO retrieved from the response to the select application command.
    CalypsoSam  
    DirectoryHeader
    The class DirectoryHeader contains all metadata of a Calypso DF.
    ElementaryFile
    The class ElementaryFile contains the description of a Calypso EF.
    FileData
    The class FileData contains all known data content of a Calypso EF.
    FileHeader
    The class FileHeader contains all metadata of a Calypso EF.
    PoSecuritySettings
    A class dedicated to managing the security settings involved in managing secure sessions.
    PoSecuritySettings.PoSecuritySettingsBuilder
    Builder pattern
    PoSelectionRequest
    Specialized selection request to manage the specific characteristics of Calypso POs
    PoSelector
    The PoSelector class extends SeSelector to handle specific PO features such as the additional successful status codes list (in response to a select application command)
    PoSelector.PoSelectorBuilder
    Builder of PoSelector
    PoTransaction
    Portable Object Secure Session.
    PoTransaction.SessionSetting  
    PoTransaction.SvSettings
    A set of enumerations used to manage Stored Value transactions
    SamIdentifier
    Holds the needed data to proceed a SAM selection.
    SamIdentifier.SamIdentifierBuilder
    Builder for a SamIdentifier
    SamResourceManager
    Management of SAM resources:
    SamResourceManagerDefault
    Implementation of Sam Resource Manager working a ReaderPlugin (either Stub or Pcsc) It is meant to work with a Keyple Pcsc Plugin or a Keyple Stub Plugin.
    SamResourceManagerFactory
    Factory that builds a SamResourceManager depending on the plugin used
    SamResourceManagerPool
    Implementation of Sam Resource Manager working a ReaderPoolPlugin
    SamSelectionRequest
    Specialized selection request to manage the specific characteristics of Calypso SAMs
    Beyond the creation of a CalypsoSam object, this class also allows to execute a command to Unlock the SAM if unlockData are present in the SamSelector.
    This unlock command is currently the only one allowed during the SAM selection process.
    SamSelector
    The SamSelector class extends SeSelector to handle specific Calypso SAM needs such as model identification.
    SamSelector.SamSelectorBuilder
    Builder of SamSelector
    SvDebitLogRecord
    The class SvDebitLogRecord contains the data of a Stored Value debit log.
    SvLoadLogRecord
    The class SvLoadLogRecord contains the data of a Stored Value load log.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileHeader.FileType
    The EF type enum
    PoSelector.InvalidatedPo
    Indicates if an invalidated PO should be selected or not.
    PoTransaction.PinTransmissionMode
    The PoTransaction.PinTransmissionMode indicates whether the PIN transmission is encrypted or not.
    PoTransaction.SessionSetting.AccessLevel
    The PO Transaction Access Level: personalization, loading or debiting.
    PoTransaction.SessionSetting.ModificationMode
    The modification mode indicates whether the secure session can be closed and reopened to manage the limitation of the PO buffer memory.
    PoTransaction.SessionSetting.RatificationMode
    The ratification mode defines the behavior of processClosing regarding the ratification process.
    PoTransaction.SvSettings.Action
    PoTransaction.SvSettings.Action specifies the type of action: Reload: DO loads a positive amount, UNDO loads a negative amount Debit: DO debits a positive amount, UNDO cancels, totally or partially, a previous debit.
    PoTransaction.SvSettings.LogRead
    PoTransaction.SvSettings.LogRead specifies whether only the log related to the current operation is requested or whether both logs are requested.
    PoTransaction.SvSettings.NegativeBalance
    PoTransaction.SvSettings.NegativeBalance indicates whether negative balances are allowed when debiting the SV
    PoTransaction.SvSettings.Operation
    PoTransaction.SvSettings.Operation specifies the type of operation intended to be carried out
    SamResourceManager.AllocationMode
